nodes.text: Flight Leader Wilkins was a Y-wing pilot who served in the ranks of the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

Wilkins was involved in an assault on the Imperial Star Destroyer Vehemence when a TIE/sa bomber collided with his Y-wing. Wilkins was blinded, and it was due to the actions of BXET-R2 that Wilkins and his Y-wing were able to escape the battle.
